html.@style:
top:6.1cm; left:15.5cm;
			position: absolute; display: block;

top:2.75cm;left: 18.15cm;
			position: absolute; min-width: 3.5cm; font-size: 15px; font-family:'Times New Roman'

top:10.00cm;left:1.0cm;
			position: absolute;  width: 19cm; height: 7.75cm; font-size: 15px; font-family:'Times New Roman'; overflow: hidden;

top:18.75cm;left:1.0cm;
			position: absolute;  width: 19cm; min-height: 7.75cm; font-size: 15px; font-family:'Times New Roman'; overflow: hidden;

table.@style: min-height: 7.00cm; margin-top: 0.15cm; font-size: 12px; font-family:'Times New Roman'

#text:
{% set total_discount = 0.00 %}
        {% for pay_ref in doc.references[:9] %}

{% set total_discount = pay_ref.discount_amount or 0 + total_discount or 0 %}
        {% endfor %}
